import React, { Component } from 'react'; import OwlCarousel from 'react-owl-carousel'; import 'owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.carousel.css'; import 'owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.theme.default.css'; import { Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './owl.css'; import CarouselControls from './CarouselControls'; // Yeni eklediğimiz komponent export class Carousel extends Component { render() { return ( this.carouselRef.next()} // "next" fonksiyonunu çağırarak sağa git onPrev={() => this.carouselRef.prev()} // "prev" fonksiyonunu çağırarak sola git />
